Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better. Colin Powell , former secretary of state in the Bush administration who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said the Bill Clinton was well positioned politically. Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection was secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside was posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters. CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Google CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.
